name: UITransitionContextViewKey
desc: The keys you use to identify the views involved in a transition.

items.name: static let from: UITransitionContextViewKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the view shown at the beginning of the transition, or at the end of a canceled transition.

items.name: static let to: UITransitionContextViewKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the view shown at the end of a completed transition.
